name: Event Manager, Events Calendar, Tickets, Registrations – Eventin
author: Themewinter

sections.description:
Struggling to run your events? Meet an Action-Packed Event Manager Plugin for creating and selling 10x event tickets on WordPress, all powered by AI ğŸ¤–.

ğŸš¨ Eventin is the #1 robust event manager plugin with a smooth event calendar, event booking, registrations, and listings where you can manage event RSVP and sell event tickets in just a few clicks. ğŸš€

Now supercharge your events and enjoy managing the event calendar with Eventin event manager plugin. Whether you run live or virtual events, This WordPress event organizer is your all-in-one event plugin to manage ğŸ“… event calendar, ğŸ“ Event RSVP, ğŸ§  event planning, ğŸ“ƒ event listing, ğŸ“‡ event registrations, ğŸ” recurring events, ğŸ‰ QR code and ğŸ« tickets â€“ faster than wind. Eventin lets you create and manage an event list the way you want, sell event tickets on a whim, help your attendees book your event, and turn your events into a big revenue-maker. ğŸš€

ğŸ§  All the useful event management and events list tutorials + Demo here ğŸ‘‡

Live Demo || Documentation || Roadmaps || Buy Pro || Ready Theme

ğŸ’¡ Need help setting up your Event Calendar Website? ğŸ‘‰ Let Us Know.

Who is Eventin Event Manager Plugin For? ğŸš¨

ğŸ“£ Event Organizers
ğŸ’ª Live and Virtual Event Planners
ğŸ­ Agency Owners
ğŸ’» Digital Marketers
ğŸ¨ Theme Developers
ğŸ¤ Meetup Hosts
ğŸ§¢ Training Professionals
ğŸ“š Online Tutors
ğŸ¸ Music Trainers
ğŸ§© Conference Event Organizers
â€¦â€¦â€¦and many more. ğŸ™Œ

Discover How to Create Multiple Events in a few seconds with Eventin Pro Events Planner:

Manage Event Calendar and Sell Event Tickets with Eventin Event Manager & Ticket Plugin – Fully compatible with [WordPress].

âš¡ Experience The Easiest Event Management Plugin: Eventin for WordPress

Planning events ğŸ§  is nothing but a breeze with Eventin! This powerful WordPress event booking plugin simplifies everything from creating events to managing attendees, saving you valuable time and resources. This âš¡ event manager plugin will make event management, selling event tickets, event registration, event RSVP and event booking WordPress easier rather than doing the grunt work!

ğŸ¤ Craft Engaging Events:

  • Single or Multiple Events: Schedule one-time events or set multiple events for days, weeks, months, or years. Create an event template and put it on repeat for effortless management of similar events.

  • Event Lists & Calendar: Showcase upcoming events with customizable lists that highlight the key details. Integrate seamlessly with Elementor for further customization options.

  • Informative Event Pages: Display real-time event information, countdowns, speaker details, and even embed videos using YouTube for attendees.

âš¡ More Free Awesome Features to Turbo-Charge Your Events:

  • Comprehensive Speaker Profiles: Create detailed profiles for your event speakers, including descriptions, pictures, social media links, and company logos.

  • Multiple Language Support: Cater to a global audience with RTL language support, ensuring a smooth user experience for everyone, regardless of the language.

  • WooCommerce Integration: Simplify the event ticket purchase process by integrating with WooCommerce, your favorite e-commerce platform.

â• Eventin empowers you to create professional and engaging live, virtual or hybrid events with a user-friendly interface and a comprehensive set of features.

âœ¨ Key Features in the short-list (in case you didn’t read):

âœ… Create single or multiple events
âœ… Display event lists and a user-friendly calendar
âœ… Informative event pages with real-time information
âœ… Easy speaker profiles with pictures, social links, and company logos
âœ… Streamlined Event RSVP system with analytical reports
âœ… money-grabbing ticket system with attendee tickets and QR codes.
âœ… Seamless Zoom integration
âœ… Multiple language support
âœ… Frontend event submission
âœ… User role management
âœ… Detailed attendee reports
âœ… WooCommerce integration

ğŸš¨ ## Eventin PRO: Everything You Need in an All-in-One Event Management for WordPress ##

ğŸ¯ Manage Events & RSVP:

  • âœ¨ Event RSVP: Allow attendees to RSVP for events directly through your website. Track responses and generate analytical reports to understand attendee demographics and interests.

  • ğŸ¤– Eventin AI: Integrated with OpenAI, Eventin lets you create an event much faster than any other event manager plugin. All you have to do is give the prompt of your event details and see it done in seconds.

  • ğŸ¨ Visual Seat Arrangement: Plan out the floor map of your event faster and sell tickets on each seat using visual seat arrangement integration by WP Timetics.

  • ğŸ“… All-Sync Calendar: Stay on track & updated with all the upcoming events with the All-Sync calendar on your dashboard.

  • ğŸ” QR Code: Make an easy event registration experience with a QR code. Scan tickets of your attendees in just a few seconds.

  • ğŸ” Recurring Events: Stop wasting time creating the same WP events manually and create recurring events in just 10 clicks!

  • ğŸ† Certificate Builder: Reward attendees with PDF certificates effortlessly and make your online events even more interesting.

  • ğŸ’° Multi-Tiered Tickets: Never miss a single seat to sell using multi-tiered tickets like VIP, Gold, etc. or sell the tickets in bulk.

  • ğŸ¢ Multivendor Event Marketplace: Build your dream multivendor event marketplace with Dokan integration. Grow more sales with an on-premise platform.

ğŸš€ Super-Fast PRO Features to 10x Grow Your Events:

  • ğŸ”  Multiple Language Support: Cater to a global audience with RTL language support, ensuring a smooth user experience for everyone.

  • ğŸª Frontend Event Submission: Empower attendees to book events directly on your website, saving them time and streamlining the process.

  • ğŸ’» Data Import & Export: Effortlessly migrate your event data between Eventin and other platforms using the import and export functionalities. This ensures a smooth transition and simplifies data management.

  • ğŸ“ˆ Event Analytics (PRO): Gain valuable insights into your event’s performance with comprehensive event analytics. Track key metrics like registrations, ticket sales, attendee demographics, and more to optimize future events.

  • â° Event Reminders: Schedule automated email or SMS reminders to keep attendees informed and engaged. Reduce no-shows and ensure a successful event turnout.

ğŸ­ Additional Features to Supercharge Your Events:

  • ğŸ¨ 10+ Multi-Event Widgets: Design your event page with more event details using various widgets.

  • ğŸ¨ 5+ Speaker Widgets: Create *attractive attendee and speaker pages.

  • ğŸ¨ 3+ Single Event Widgets: Spend less time designing your event organizer page with dedicated widgets.

  • ğŸ” Filter Events by Tag Name (Elementor widget): Add event filtering based on tag names using the Elementor widget.

  • ğŸ”” Reminder/ Notification about Upcoming Events: Remind attendees and users of upcoming events with reminder notifications so they never miss a single event.

  • Detailed Attendee Reports: Track attendee details, registration status, and ticket purchases to gain valuable insights and improve future events.

  • ğŸ‘” User Role Management: Assign specific user roles for event creation, ticket sales, QR code scanning, and manual attendee registration for secure event management.

  • â“ Add Unlimited F.A.Q. to an Event: Answer common questions for your events list by adding unlimited FAQs for each event.

  • ğŸ‰ Event Banner Option with Color or Custom Image: Customize your event page with a custom banner image or color that matches your event theme.

  • ğŸ“œ Print Event Invoices: Easily print invoices for event attendees.

  • âœ… Unified Ticketing System: Simplify event ticketing with a unified ticketing system.

  • ğŸ“ Update Attendee Data: Allow attendees to update their information post-ticket purchase.

  • ğŸ‘‘ Personalized Email Notifications: Send personalized email notifications to event participants.

  • ğŸ™‹â€â™‚ï¸ Attendee Personal Details: Empower attendees to maintain accurate information.

  • â° Multi-Repeater Scheduling: Craft captivating event experiences with trendy, multi-repeater scheduling, as recurring events.

  • â° Show Event Timer on Single Event Registration Page Banner: Add a countdown event timer to your event page for users to easily determine how much time is left before the event begins.

  • ğŸ“Œ Multiple Event and Speaker Templates: Choose from a series of professional templates to find the perfect match for your events.

  • ğŸ”° Show Event Attendees on the Event Details Page: Let attendees know who is attending the event with an attendee list on the event details page.

  • ğŸŒ€ Generate & Show Unique IDs on Event Tickets & Reports for Attendees: Keep track of your event attendees with unique ticket IDs that appear on attendee tickets and reports.

  • ğŸ“ˆ View / Export Attendee Report as CSV or JSON: Get your attendee reports in CSV or JSON format to manage event attendees.

  • âœ¨ Unlimited Extra Fields for Attendee Registration Form: Add unlimited fields for attendee registration forms and check attendee submissions by exporting data as CSV reports.

ğŸ”— Power-Packed Integrations to Help You Make Better Events:

  • ğŸ“§ SureTrigger Integration: Boost efficiency with automated workflows, and personalize the attendee experience at your events with SureTrigger integration.

  • ğŸ¥ Zoom Integration: Skyrocket the virtual/hybrid event management experience with seamless Zoom integration.

  • ğŸ“… iCal + Outlook + Google Calendar Integration: Sync *events with Google Calendar, iCal, and Outlook for easy event management.

  • ğŸ¤ BuddyBoss Integration: Create your course community with your event attendees with just a few clicks using the BuddyBoss integration.

  • ğŸ¨ Divi Builder Integration: Build a visually-attractive event management website with ease using Divi integration.

  • ğŸ“ˆ Pabbly Integration: Seamlessly integrate Pabbly for smooth data flow between events.

  • ğŸ“§ FluentCRM Integration: Put Email Marketing into your event planner strategy with FluentCRM integration for effortless planning, sending, and automating email marketing campaigns.

  • ğŸ“ Groundhogg Integration: Automate and grow email marketing campaigns that will grow revenue from your WordPress events and help you sell more tickets.

  • ğŸ“£ Twilio Integration: Improve communication with attendees using Twilio integration.

  • ğŸ“ˆ Zapier Integration: Enhance workflow automation with Zapier integration.

Eventin Review by WordPress Expert Event Managers WorldWide

ğŸ† Featured by Leading Experts in WordPress:

  • Elegant Themes: “Eventin â€“ Event & Conference Divi Theme is perfect for any kind of Conference, Event, Meetup, Seminar, Exhibition, Meet Up, Congress, Meeting, Business Conference, Webinars, Event Management website.”

  • WPAstra: “With a diverse set of features, it is dedicated to simplifying event organization and ensuring a smooth, efficient process.”

  • Kinsta: “The pluginâ€™s exceptional quality is not only reflected in user reviews but also evidenced by ThemeWinterâ€™s long-standing commitment to delivering top-notch products.”

  • Webnus: “This fun plugin might not be the most popular plugin in the market, but has been welcomed tremendously by new WP users.”

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. All Settings will be found in Admin sidebar -> Eventin

eg. This plugin requires Woocommerce to use all functionality.
sections.faq:
Do you have an Event RSVP available?

Yes, we do! Eventin offers an RSVP solution to send your attendees a customizable response form to respond to your events immediately.

Do you have any features to design event seat arrangements?

Absolutely! Eventin has a seat arrangement feature, integrated with our very own brainchild, WP Timetics. You can easily use this drag-n-drop visual seat map builder to draw your event venue, design seating arrangements and put ticket pricing on each seat based on different categories like VIP, GOLD, PLATINUM, etc.

Do you support all kinds of payments?

Of course! Since Eventin has integrated with WooCommerce, you can access to all popular payment methods on WooCommerce including Stripe and PayPal.

Does it support multi-language?

Eventin supports multi-language on your WordPress site with WPML compatibility. You can translate to any language on Eventin.

Does Eventin have any page builder compatibility?

Yes, Eventin has tons of compatibility with popular page builders like Divi, Bricks Builder, Astra, etc. ğŸ’» If you have more questions about Page builder compatibility, simply reach us on the ThemeWinter Support and we will respond immediately! ğŸ¤

Tell me more about Eventin Free vs. Pro

You will do great events with the Free version. However, we recommend using Eventin Pro to give you the best possible outcomes for your events. ğŸ’ª You can use Multi-tiered tickets, put QR codes to scan tickets, use multiple templates for speakers, send RSVP forms to attendees, and even import & export all event data in CSV/JSON format and integrate with popular tools to make a greater event on PRO version. ğŸ’¸

How do I sell tickets to events on my event calendar?

The Visual seat arrangement feature makes it easier to sell your tickets at events. ğŸ¨ You can simply design the floor map and then put ticket pricing on each seat and different ticket categories to sell premium commodities and even sell swags & goodies at your events.

I have a feature idea. How can I share this with you guys?

Great! We would love to take ideas from you. Simply reach us on ThemeWinter Roadmap and share your great ideas there, we will be sure to publish it for the world to see. ğŸ™

Does Eventin have a QR scanner to verify your attendees on tickets?

Yes, Eventin offers a unique QR scanner solution to scan all the single/bulk tickets at once and save tons of time during event registration. Learn more about QR scanners on Eventin.
